title: Fibonacci Trade Count Signal
mechanism: ABSURD HYPOTHESIS: Markets with exactly 5, 8, 13, 21, or 34 trades may have different dynamics. The Fibonacci sequence appears in nature and markets - maybe the 'natural' stopping points for market activity reveal something.

proposed_signal.condition: Total trade count in market is a Fibonacci number (5, 8, 13, 21, 34)
proposed_signal.action: Follow the majority trade direction in Fibonacci-count markets

price_proxy_risk: LOW - trade count is independent of price
